SALESFORCE HELP

VLOCITY HEALTH
Vlocity Health Data Model

The Vlocity Health Insurance data model is a comprehensive data model covering everything needed for a cloud front and middle office system across all health and health insurance businesses (large group, small group, individual (ACA), and Medicare Advantage).

The data model covers concepts such as benefit plans and contracts, group census, quoting and enrollment, complete policy administration for individual and family policies, claims management, network management for health providers and pharmacies, formularies management for drug pricing, and much more.

The Vlocity Health data model is a 100% additive extension of the standard Salesforce data model that leverages and extends the Salesforce Cloud objects. The Vlocity Health data model is designed to work seamlessly with Salesforce Health Cloud.

Each ERD illustrates the important entities, relationships and the Vlocity extensions to the Salesforce object model. For a list of all the data, system and integration objects for the Vlocity Health data model, see the object list below. To understand the notation used in these diagrams, see About Vlocity Entity Relationship Diagram Notation.

NOTE

Salesforce provides industry-specific data models, built on top of the Salesforce object model, for each of the industries served by Salesforce. The logical entity relationship diagrams (ERDs) provided in this section illustrate the important entities and relationships for a given topic.

The ERDs illustrate how Salesforce extends the standard Salesforce object model to tailor it to the needs of each industry. Salesforce will, on request, provide a physical copy of a Salesforce Industry Data Model Blueprint to customers and partners. This industry-specific 2 x 3-feet logical ERD diagram documents the Salesforce data model for all the key business entities in a given industry.

To receive a copy, you'll need to sign an NDA Acknowledgement. If you would like to request an industry data model blueprint, please contact Vlocity Support at support@vlocity.com or log a case specifying which industry diagram you desire and where you want it sent (mailing address).

NOTE The content on this page may only be viewed by customers or partners of Salesforce who are authorized users of Salesforce cloud business applications pursuant to an agreement between Vlocity and such customer or partner, or in the absence of any such agreement, the terms at https://vlocity.com/terms (in either case, the "Main Agreement"). Employees and contractors of Vlocity may also view the content. The content is the highly confidential and proprietary information of Vlocity and is protected under the confidentiality obligations of the Main Agreement. Accordingly, the content may be used only as necessary to complete your responsibilities related to the Agreement. Copying and further distribution is prohibited without prior written consent from Vlocity.
Individual, Medicare, & Group Customer Model ERD

A subset of the Vlocity Health data model represents the customer.

Group Shop, Quote, and Enroll ERD

A subset of the Vlocity Health data model represents quotes and enrollment for groups.

Group Account Management ERD

A subset of the Vlocity Health data model represents accounts.

Individual & Medicare Shop, Quote, and Enroll ERD

A subset of the Vlocity Health data model represents quotes and enrollment for individuals.

Channel & Broker Management ERD

A subset of the Vlocity Health data model represents channels and brokers.

Network & Provider Management ERD

A subset of the Vlocity Health data model represents networks and providers.

Network & Provider Management + Health Cloud Provider Relationship Management ERD

A subset of the Vlocity Health data model represents network and provider relationships.

Formulary & Pharmacy Management ERD

A subset of the Vlocity Health data model represents pharmacies.

Billing & Payments Management ERD

A subset of the Vlocity Health data model represents billing.

Claims Management ERD

A subset of the Vlocity Health data model represents claims.

Document Generation and Contract Management ERD

A subset of the Vlocity Health data model represents documents and contracts.

Vlocity Health Object List

For details about Vlocity Insurance and Financial Services objects, see the Health Object List.

Certificate of Capacity Object
Certificate of Capacity is submitted by an injured worker to the employer or insurer to claim compensation. The Certificate of Capacity is a form that is filled by a Medical Practitioner who certifies the injured worker’s capacity based on what work they can do. The Certificate of Capacity is created as a part of the claim submission process and is visible as a dedicated tab on the claim record.
